channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overflowing electrical recycling container, 7th January
item.description:
There is a recycling bin for electrical items near the zebra crossing on the station side. It has clearly not been emptied for a long while. Since Christmas people have put their recycling beside it as they cannot fit anything else into the hopper. The pavement is getting clogged at this point. This looks a mess and is dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honor Oak Park, Honor Oak, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bulk rubbish overflowing attracting vermin, 7th January
item.description:
The bulk rubbish at Valette House is overflowing, could it be collected please? It hasnâ€™t been collected since before Christmas. None of the bulk rubbish is mine, I am reporting this because of the rubbish attracting vermin. Many thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Valette Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish excess, 7th January
item.description:
The recycling bins are regularly overflowing. Valette house has four recycling bins. Two positioned to either side of the estate. Could the estate either have two more recycling bins, making it 3 on each side or the frequency of collection increased please
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Valette Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattresses dumped, 7th January
item.description:
3 mattresses have been dumped on the pavement in an area that is not overlooked by any houses. This area often has rubbish discarded there and cars parked suspiciously. We really need cctv in this part of the road.
